id: 63 more cases of salmonella linked to recalled raw beef
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Debra Goldschmidt, CNNUpdated 7:13 PM ET, Wed October 24, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)Sixty-three additional cases of salmonella have been identified in an ongoing, multistate outbreak linked to raw beef products, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Tuesday.
